annotations.description: A mildly tweaked update on the Grand Royal Fizz, a lesser-known gin fizz variation included in The Savoy Cocktail Book, Jillian Moore’s Thunderbird stri
annotations.title: Thunderbird Cocktail Recipe | PUNCH

textContent:
2 ounces gin
1/2 ounce Luxardo Maraschino liqueur
1 ounce orange juice
3/4 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce cream
1/2 ounce simple syrup
1/2 teaspoon powdered sugar
Club soda
Garnish: orange wheel  

Combine all ingredients, except club soda, in a mixing tin and shake with ice.
Strain into a Collins glass over ice.
Top with club soda.
Garnish with orange wheel.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/thunderbird/
title: Thunderbird
